Authors and Citation

Authors

  • Finn Lindgren. Author, maintainer, copyright holder.
    Finn Lindgren wrote the main code

  • Seaton Andy. Contributor.
    Andy Seaton constributed features to the sf support

  • Suen Man Ho. Contributor.
    Man Ho Suen contributed features and code structure design for the integration methods

  • Fabian E. Bachl. Contributor.
    Fabian Bachl co-developed precursors of fm_pixels and fm_split_lines in inlabru

Source: DESCRIPTION
